subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: J. J. Redick scored 17 points in place of the injured Vince Carter, and the Magic ended a four-game losing streak with a 113-81 victory against the Hawks.
snippet: J. J. Redick scored 17 points in place of the injured Vince Carter, and the Magic ended a four-game losing streak with a 113-81 victory against the Hawks.
